title: Vegetalia
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Lunch buffet is vegetarian with some vegan choices and always includes beans, rice, soup, leaf salad, fresh fruit, and a hot vegetable. Has daily specials and offers soy based meat substitute with vegetable. Drinks include a fruit-based drink. Located to the side of the main plaza, near the cathedral.
